summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eleventh Avenue West, Twelfth Avenue West, and Thirteenth Avenue West each from West Ray Street to Grand Boulevard; Fourteen Avenue West, from West Barrett Street to West Armour Street; West Armour Street, from Eleventh Avenue West to Fifteenth Avenue West; Prosch Place, from Eleventh Avenue West to Thirteenth Avenue West; West Barrett Street, from Eleventh Avenue West to Twelfth Avenue West; Grand Boulevard, from Eleventh Avenue West to Thirteenth Avenue West; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2578 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
